1046810.name: Hyperstacks Demo
1046810.description: This is a trial version of Hyperstacks which is still in development, it is a public version of the game with less features but in its current state of development, in the demo you will be able to have the initial game mode and play it as you like but you will only have the levels that we have added for the demo in advance and also your own levels, as well as the level editor, which you will have access to but most of the useful, new and developing elements will remain hidden
1046810.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 韩语, 日语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
